subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Tests on Monday unexpectedly showed that a cracked bone in Shaun Alexander’s foot had not completely healed. That means Seattle is not likely to have Alexander for Monday night’s game against the Oakland Raiders.
snippet: Tests on Monday unexpectedly showed that a cracked bone in Shaun Alexander’s foot had not completely healed. That means Seattle is not likely to have Alexander for Monday night’s game against the Oakland Raiders.
